newsitem.title: USA: Techniclone agent improves tumor absorption.
newsitem.headline: Techniclone agent improves tumor absorption.

text.p: Techniclone Corp said Thursday its Vasopermeation Enhancement technology was found to significantly increase tumor absorption of anti-cancer agents in pre-clinical trials.
The technology works by making blood vessels that feed a tumor more permeable so that they can become a pathway for anti-cancer agents.

The company said researchers at the University of Southern California found the agent achieved a threefold increase in permeability of tumor vessels, allowing a greater intake of chemotherapy and other cancer agents.
It also said doctors in Japan achieved similar results. Their findings are being presented this week at the annual Society of Nuclear Medicine meeting in San Antonio, Texas.
